boardgame.name: Lost Legacy: Flying Garden
Zaginione Dziedzictwo: Latający Ogród
Ztracené Dědictví: Létající Zahrada
Тайное Наследие. Небесный Сад
boardgame.description: Lost Legacy: Flying Garden is a game of risk, deduction, and luck for 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;4 players. You start the game with one card in hand from a deck of sixteen cards. On a turn, you do the following:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Draw: Draw the top card from the deck and add it to your hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Play: Choose one of the two cards in hand to play and place it face up in front of you._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Effect: Carry out the played card's effect, after which the card is considered as discarded._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; End: If there is at least one card left in the deck, the turn goes to the next player; if not, the investigation phase starts. Using the investigation speed indicated on the card each player has in hand, players take turns guessing which player (whether yourself or someone else) holds the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Lost Legacy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; card; this card might also be in the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Ruins_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, a location that holds one card at the start of the game and possibly acquires more cards during play. The player who guesses correctly wins; if no one finds the Lost Legacy, then everybody loses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;By combining different Lost Legacy sets (while keeping only a single Lost Legacy card in play), up to six players can compete at the same time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is the English release of the 16 cards Flying Garden set in Lost Legacy with new artwork. The Starship set is released separately._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5815) Scattered across the world are pieces of a strange craft from far beyond the skies - known as the Lost Legacies. In the eastern peaks, legends speak of a floating paradise, a garden of unearthly delights protected by an implacable guardian. Some of these legends claim the garden provides an unending source of ambrosial food and water. Discover where the Lost Legacy can be found and win the game! Lost Legacy is a card game of risk, deduction and luck, designed by Kanai (Love Letter) and Hayato Kisaragi. Players start with one card in hand, and then draw and/or play cards from the 16 card deck, until the cards run out. Then the investigation stage starts, with players trying to determine who has the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Lost Legacy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; card. The player with the highest point total at the end wins.
